tasks.label: build
tasks.command: g++ main.cpp -ggdb -B file_parser/file_parser.h file_parser/file_parser.cpp -B operation_parser/operation_parser.h operation_parser/operation_parser.cpp -B operation_queuer/operations_queue/operations_queue.h operation_queuer/operations_queue/operations_queue.cpp -B operation_queuer/operation_queuer.h operation_queuer/operation_queuer.cpp shared/operations/operations.h shared/operations/operations.cpp -B shared/constants.h -o godless
